additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Urea, Cetearyl Alcohol, Potassium Thioglycolate, Ceteareth-20, Calcium Hydroxide, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Paraffinum Liquidum, Magnesium Trisilicate, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, Lithium Magnesium Sodium Silicate, Sodium Gluconate, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Acrylates Copolymer, Hydrated Silica, BHT, Tocopherol, CI 77891.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Retain outer pack for all precautions. - Read & follow all precautions and directions before use. Failure to follow directions for use and precautions may result in chemical burns. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time. - Suitable for use on the legs, arms, underarms & bikini line. Not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples or any other parts. - Do not use on varicose veins, scars, moles, spotty, broken, irritated, sunburnt skin or on skin that has had an adverse reaction to hair removal cream in the past.

description: Veet Natural In Shower Hair Removal Cream
name: Natural In Shower Hair Removal Cream
